Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nostalgic \Nos*tal"gic\, a. [Cf. F. nostalgique.] Of or pertaining to nostalgia; affected with nostalgia. [1913 Webster]
nostalgic adj : unhappy at being away and longing for familiar things or persons [syn: {homesick}]
